'''1.20.5 Pre-Release 4''' (known as '''1.20.5-pre4''' in the launcher) is the fourth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20.5]], released on April 17, 2024,<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-20-5-pre-release-4|Minecraft 1.20.5 Pre-Release 4}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Resource pack]]'''
* The [[resource pack version]] is now <code>32</code>.

'''[[Font]]'''
* <code>shift</code> in TTF glyph providers is now restricted to the range <code>[-512;512]</code>.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.5 Pre-Release 4
|;From 1.20.3
|266557|The breeze sometimes moves around while attacking, interrupting its attack animation.
|;dev
|268571|Bogged is listed in biomes in vanilla datapack, not {{cd|update_1_21}}.
|270666|The game tries to spawn [[bogged]] without experimental feature "Update 1.21" active but fails.
|;prev
|270825|Certain [[simulation distance]] values cannot be saved visually.
|270838|Stationary [[fireball]]s can no longer be redirected.
|270845|Summoned [[wind charge]]s can no longer be redirected.
}}</onlyinclude>
